Title: The Weight of Earth
Description: I have an order for several hundred tons of Primal Molten Alloy, but I have run out of Rousing Earth. I know it's a heavy ask, but I can make it worth your while!
ObjectivesText: Gather 15 Rousing Earth for Sekita the Burrower in Valdrakken.
RewardText:
Perfect. Just what I needed.

Take these old field notes. There must be something in there that will teach you about mining.
